T02D3114:214a-1: a'arya si t'a ta pa tre aa pa r'a dzi ta s'a dha nam /
T02D3114:214a-3: 'phags ma gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub pa sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02D3114:214a-4: gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3114:214a-5: dang por tho rangs langs te /
T02D3114:214a-6: byang chub kyi sems dran par byas la /
T02D3114:214a-7: rang tha mal pa'i snying ga phye ba'i steng du
T02D3114:214a-8: zla ba nya ba la aom dkar po bsams te
T02D3114:214a-9: / de'i 'od kyis rang gi sdig pa dag pa dang /
T02D3114:214a-10: kha dang ba spu'i bu ga nas 'thon te /
T02D3114:214a-11: sems can gyi don byas shing /
T02D3114:214a-12: 'og min nas gdugs dkar mo can /
T02D3114:214a-13: bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'[?]
T02D3114:214a-14: bskor ba mdun gyi nam mkha' la spyan drangs te
T02D3114:214a-15: / phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod pa dang /
T02D3114:214a-17: bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
T02D3114:214a-21: yan lag lnga pa byas la /
T02D3114:214a-22: de'i bsod nams byang chub tu bsngo bar bya'o //
T02D3114:214a-23: de nas byams snying rje dga' ba btang snyoms bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3114:214a-24: de nas snod bcud ma lus pa bsdus te /
T02D3114:214a-26: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konyham zhes brjod do //
T02D3114:214b-0: de'i rjes su pam las padma'i steng du aa las zla ba'i @214b dkyil 'khor dmigs la /
T02D3114:214b-1: de'i steng du aom dkar po dang bcas par gyur pa las /
T02D3114:214b-2: gdugs dkar mo can gyi sku bsam ste /
T02D3114:214b-3: zhal gsum pa la phyag drug ma //
T02D3114:214b-4: sku mdog dkar mo 'gying bag can //
T02D3114:214b-5: dbus dkar g-yas sngo g-yon dmar zhal //
T02D3114:214b-6: spyan gsum khro mo'i lta stangs can ;
T02D3114:214b-8: / g-yas pa 'khor lo lcags kyu mda' //
T02D3114:214b-9: g-yon pa rdo rje dkar po gzhu //
T02D3114:214b-10: zhags pa dang bcas sdigs mdzub nyid //
T02D3114:214b-11: gza' kun 'joms par byed pa ma //
T02D3114:214b-12: skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs //
T02D3114:214b-13: lha yi rgyan dang na bza' ldan //
T02D3114:214b-14: rnam snang mdzad kyis dbu brgyan ma//
T02D3114:214b-15: de ltar bdag nyid lha mor bsam //
T02D3114:214b-16: de'i snying gang padma'i steng zla ba la aom dkar po'i 'od zer gyis /
T02D3114:214b-17: ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la gzhug pa dang /
T02D3114:214b-18: dbang bskur zhing rigs kyi dbu rgyan gyi bdag po rnam snang gis rgyas gdab ste /
T02D3114:214b-19: yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs la phyag rgya bcas te /
T02D3114:214b-20: lag pa khu tshur snying gar bca' ste /
T02D3114:214b-21: lag pa g-yon pa'i khu tshur g-yas pa'i mdzub mo nas gyen du blta bar bya'o //
T02D3114:214b-23: aom si t'a ta pa tre aa pa r'a dzi
T02D3114:214b-24: ta sarba gra h'a na tra y'a y'a ya y'a
T02D3114:214b-25: ha na dr'um dr'um hram hram phat phat sv'a h'a
T02D3114:214b-27: gtor ma ni yi ge gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D3114:214b-28: aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am a'adya
T02D3114:214b-29: nutpan na tv'a ta aom a'a: h'um phat sv'a h'a
T02D3114:214b-30: / zhes 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor mas sbyin par bya'o //
T02D3114:214b-31: 'phags pa gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02D3114:214b-33: // / rgya gar shar phyogs kyi pandi ta bi bh'u ti tsandra dang /
